work.name: UM6P - College Of Computing
work.summary:
Industrial Project (Confidential): Develop a pipeline for a Moroccan company to automate insights search using open source news and internal reports 
 Research Project: Develop machine/deep learning models for histotological image segmentation and processing.

work.name: Telecom SudParis | Paris, France
work.summary: Develop and optimize deep neural networks to detect blood cells using bi-modal images (Phase and Intensity) generated by new type of microscopes developed by Telecom SudParis. The work was carried out within the framework of TAMIS project (AI for an improved healthcare system supported by BPI France and the Health Data Hub).

work.name: GoodYear Tire & Rubber Company
work.summary: Measure and evaluate tires’ temperature and performance using Deep Learning on infrared images

education.institution: Ecole National Superieur des Mines de Saint-Etienne

education.area: Two-year intensive program in advanced mathematics and physics to prepare for the highly competitive and prestigious French and Moroccan engineering schools.
